resources.string:
• Initial Release of new UI 
• Added gallery 
• Added contact info 
• Added appointment feature! Still in beta. 
• Plan to add option to set appointment in app and sync with your calender. 
• Email the owner 
• Pay via Paypal from app 
• Turn by turn directions 
• Rate this app (thanks from James aka developer) 
• more to come soon.
• Added New icon to match app theme \n• Fixed a lot of references for various layouts and colors
• Debug layouts to fix FC on some dpi sizes \n• Fixed pay via PayPal

• Added connection to theme engine to apply theme from eithin the theme 
• New UI (again...) 
• More Infamous 
• Added a bunch of requested wallpapers! 
• Working on app theme requests now 
• Fixed some bugs 
• If Playstore still FC, let me know. Also a log would be amazing! 
• Fixed scaling on top banner across all screen sizes

• Added Google Keep 
• Tweaked Gmail to clean it up 
• Working on a bunch more that arent ready yet 
• Added link to Team Blacked Out updater app. Thank you guys for all you do! 
• cleaning up app and UI 
• Added back sounds and notifications per request
• Fixed Nova and Go Launcher \n• Added working Go Launcher "Apply" button

• Added Changelog dialog on first run after install/update 
• NEW Section for showing off new icons 
• Overflow Menu added and some grid items moved to it 
• New Theme Info Animation 
• Organized and cleaned up some misc files including strings.xml

• Fixed FC on Android 4.3 Devices 
• Removed unused parts of GlassActionBar Library 
• Resized feature banner layout 
• Fixed bg issues with main layout 
• Removed AppActivity and its layouts 
• Lots of cleanup
• Fixed ADW Apply intent (Thanks XDA Member lancelinksp) \n• Updated Tablet landscape layout to match better with the newer gridview
• Added Basic Request \n• Added All icons section to replace New Icons section \n• Lots of refractoring and some code cleanup

• Reworked Apply section 
• New home layout 
• More launcher support 
• Fixed sizing for "All Icons" section
